docs.lead_paragraph: An advisory panel to the Food and Drug Administration voted 19 to 10 to recommend increased restrictions on hydrocodone products, the country’s most widely used narcotic painkillers.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Panel Recommends Restrictions on Hydrocodone Products Like Vicodin
headline.main: F.D.A. Likely to Add Limits on Painkillers
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Likely To Add Limits On Painkillers

docs.abstract: Advisory panel to Food and Drug Administration votes to toughen restrictions on painkillers that contain hydrocodone, country's most widely used narcotic painkillers; recommendation would make drugs harder to prescribe, major policy change aimed at easing growing problem of painkiller addiction.
docs.snippet: An advisory panel to the Food and Drug Administration voted 19 to 10 to recommend increased restrictions on hydrocodone products, the country’s most widely used narcotic painkillers.
